General.Name: Plant & Co. Brands Ltd
General.Description: Happy Belly Food Group Inc. provides food products in Canada. The company operates through two segments, Consumer Product Goods and Quick Restaurant Services. It produces and sells breakfast cereal and related food products, and snack foods under the Holy Crap and Lumber Heads brands through retailers and online retailers, and its website. The company also operates plant-based restaurants under the Yamchops, Heal Lifestyle, and Lettuce Love names in southern Ontario. The company was formerly known as Plant & Co. Brands Ltd. and changed its name to Happy Belly Food Group Inc. in September 2022. Happy Belly Food Group Inc. was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1681 Chestnut Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6J 4M6

1.Name: Mr. Michael Dean Callaway CPA, M.B.A.
